target.generate: SCHEMA: person(ssn, surname, name) INSTANCE: person(ssn: "123", surname: "Smith", name: "John") person(ssn: "123", surname: "Doe", name: "Josh") person(ssn: "321", surname: "White", name: "Mike") person(ssn: "321", surname: "Red", name: "Frank") person(ssn: "321", surname: "White", name: "Mike")

scenario.dependencies:
ExtEGDs: person(ssn: $ssn, surname: $surname1, name: $name1), person(ssn: $ssn, surname: $surname2, name: $name2) -> $surname1 == $surname2.
person(ssn: $ssn1, surname: $surname, name: $name1), person(ssn: $ssn2, surname: $surname, name: $name2) -> $name1 == $name2.
